headline: International Paper Announces Facility Alignment in the Rio Grande Valley as Part of Strategic Growth Initiative in North America
summary: International Paper (NYSE: IP; LSE: IPC) today announced the consolidation of its operations in the Rio Grande Valley to better serve customers. As part of its strategic growth initiative, and commitment to the Rio Grande Valley, the company will make strategic investments to convert the current Edinburg, Tex. sheet plant into a warehouse, invest in its current facility in McAllen, Tex. to increase capabilities and shift its current Reynosa, Mexico operations to a new, more modern and capable fa
